name: TendaBeli
0:
”Alexa, turn on smart plug”
”Alexa, turn off smart plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To control your Tenda Beli devices, such as Smart Plugs, with the Tenda Beli App and the voice-activated Amazon Alexa, perform the following steps:
1. Search for "Tenda Beli" in Google Play or iOS App Store, and download it on your smart phone.
2. Run the Tenda Beli App, and register an account. If you have registered one, you can log in to the App with it directly. 
3. Add your Tenda Beli devices to the Tenda Beli App. 
4. Re-name your Tenda Beli devices in the Tenda Beli App. For example, if you re-name the Smart Plug "Bedroom light", Echo will identify and mark the Smart Plug as the name of "Bedroom light".
5. Download the Amazon Alexa App, and connect it to Echo. 
6. Run the Alexa App, and search for "Tenda Beli" in the Alexa Skills list.
7. Tap "ENABLE TO USE" to enable the skill, and enter your Tenda Beli App login account name and password on the page that is displayed.
8. Tap "DISCOVER DEVICES".
9. Done. Now, try talking with Echo to interact with your Tenda Beli devices.

Tenda Beli voice commands:
Commands for turning on/off your Tenda Beli devices, such as a smart plug:
* Alexa,turn on smart plug
* Alexa,turn off smart plug
For more technical support, please visit www.tendacn.com
